Regulation Name(s): Automated fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) enumeration systems
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) non-small cell lung cancer tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GenASIs ScanView System and ALK System Application as an automated accessory for FISH-based detection and enumeration of cell and gene abnormalities in multiple cancer and cytogenetic contexts.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated image analysis system used as an accessory to FDA-cleared FISH probe kits for enumeration and classification of specific cell types or gene rearrangements in FFPE tissue or urine specimens, to assist in diagnosis and monitoring of cancers (lung, breast, bladder) and effectiveness of bone marrow transplantation.
